title: CoverageGap
description: An identified deficit between required and achieved test coverage for a target or requirement, typically surfaced during test summary reporting per IEEE 829-2008. Gaps require remediation, risk acceptance (CoverageExclusion), or deferral.

severity.description: Risk level of leaving this gap unaddressed

affectedRequirements.description: Identifier or reference to the requirement(s) that remain uncovered due to this gap.

remediationStatus.description: Lifecycle state of this coverage gap.

targetRef.description: ID of the testing.testcoveragetarget where this gap was identified
